com.k2.Html5Builder

Class HtmlPage

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.k2.XMLBuilder.XMLNode
      • com.k2.XMLBuilder.XMLElement
        • com.k2.XMLBuilder.XMLDocument
          • com.k2.Html5Builder.HtmlPage

  • public class HtmlPage
extends com.k2.XMLBuilder.XMLDocument
    This class defines an HtmlPage instance. HtmlPage instants automatically contain the 'head' and 'body' tags. These two tags are added to the contents of the 'html' XMLElement as ususal and are also exposed as protected fields. HtmlPages also define the <DOCTYPE> tag
    Author:
    simon

    • Field Summary

      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      (package private) HtmlBody body
      The body HtmlElement
      (package private) HtmlHead head
      The head HtmlElement

      • Fields inherited from class com.k2.XMLBuilder.XMLNode

        contents, parent, xb

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      HtmlPage(Html5Builder hb, java.lang.String docType)
      Create an instance of the HtmlPage element Setting the doctype to the given docType and the html builder that created the html page This method also sets the head and body fields to appropriate html elements in the pages contents
      HtmlPage(Html5Builder hb, java.lang.String docType, boolean includeXmlProlog)
      Create an instance of the HtmlPage element Setting the doctype to the given docType and the html builder that created the html page and identifying whether or not to include the Xml prolog This method also sets the head and body fields to appropriate html elements in the pages contents

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      protected java.lang.String prolog()
      Override the prolog() method to return the doctype rather than the xml prolog unless includeXmlProlog has been set on the HtmlPage in which case both the xml prolog and the doctype is returned
      HtmlPage setEncoding(java.lang.String encoding)
      Override the setEncoding(...) method to return this;
      HtmlPage setVersion(java.lang.String version)
      Override the setVersion(...) method to return this;

      A better named method to generate the html in a file
      java.io.PrintWriter toHtml(java.io.PrintWriter pw)
      A better named method to generate the html to a print writer
      java.io.Writer toHtml(java.io.Writer w)
      A better named method to generate the html to a writer

        Parameters:
        hb - The html builder that created the html page
        docType - The doctype of this page

      • HtmlPage

        public HtmlPage(Html5Builder hb,
                java.lang.String docType,
                boolean includeXmlProlog)
        Create an instance of the HtmlPage element Setting the doctype to the given docType and the html builder that created the html page and identifying whether or not to include the Xml prolog This method also sets the head and body fields to appropriate html elements in the pages contents
        Parameters:
        hb - The html builder that created the html page
        docType - The doctype of this page
        includeXmlProlog - True if the xml prolog should also be included with the doctype
